name: A. Mark the Photographer
statement:
Mark is asked to take a group photo of 2n people. The i-th person has
height h_i units.To do so, he ordered these people into two rows, the
front row and the back row, each consisting of n people. However, to
ensure that everyone is seen properly, the j-th person of the back row
must be at least x units taller than the j-th person of the front row
for each j between 1 and n, inclusive.Help Mark determine if this is
possible.
